message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1200000.  This is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know if you're interested.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $1200000 is a bit too high for me. Given its value to me, I'm willing to pay $900000. Let me know if you're open to negotiating further.

Bob, I understand your position, but $900000 is too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1100000. This price still reflects the value of the product, and I believe it's fair for both of us. Let me know if you're interested in continuing our discussion.
Alice, I appreciate you being flexible. $1100000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $950000. I believe this is a fair compromise, and I'm eager to finalize the deal.
